I called my senators and the WH to express my disdain for confirming Sessions. Am I wrong or is it @kalpenn 's voice still on the comms vm?
@commanderpark29 end of this convo. I calmly & logically debated and answered all your questions for you to deflect and provide 0 discourse
@commanderpark29 hes endangering lives, creating a nation of fear, destroying foreign pol & appointing the most underqualified cabinet ever
@commanderpark29 1. Judging by your Twitter he's not even your president. 2. That's honestly what you came back with? That's such a cop out
@commanderpark29 uh he's draining federal funds and putting people in charge that have no idea what they're doing
@commanderpark29 baits Isis & encourages further attacks. Intelligent appointments and funds for intelligence combatting domestic terrorism
@commanderpark29 to start do not remove joint chiefs and intelligence from SC. Do not propagate narrative that all Muslims are bad b/c that
@commanderpark29 most US terrorist attacks past 30 yrs have been from US citizens. All 15 9/11 terrorists wouldn't be included in this ban
@nytimes same guy who said he was a Leninist and wanted to "destroy the state" right? https://t.co/HejuasNe01
@commanderpark29 1. And neither are you 2. This is unconstitutional. US has an extreme vetting process already https://t.co/FHqODPYFiG
@MMFlint I just called. The woman on the phone said to contact them on the website since they don't take messages on that line....???..
@TheDemocrats @SenateDems American living abroad and trying to call my senators but their mailbox is always full. What should I do to help?
